items.title: BMW, I am so breaking up with you
items.description: I’m driving my i4 back to the dealership as my lease is over. I'm surprised to say I can't wait.

items.title: Indian grocery startup Citymall raises $47M to challenge ultra-fast delivery giants
items.description: Indian e-commerce startup Citymall, which focuses on budget-focused grocery delivery for tier 2 and tier 3 towns, said today that it has raised $47 mi...

items.title: U.S. and Indian VCs just formed a $1B+ alliance to fund India’s deep tech startups
items.description: Eight U.S. and Indian VC and PE giants are teaming up to fuel India's deep tech boom.

items.title: India’s Offgrid raises $15M to make lithium optional for battery storage
items.description: India's Offgrid Energy Labs has developed proprietary zinc battery tech as a safer, more cost-effective alternative to lithium for energy storage.

items.title: LayerX uses AI to cut enterprise back-office workload, scores $100M in Series B
items.description: This Japanese AI startup just raised $100M to cut businesses’ admin burden.
